::DarkMouse::

"HellBeast? Disks?"  She shook her head. "Well, if she said we know 
it when we saw it, then let's look for it." Mumbles about wishing she 
knew more about what she was looking for.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike: 
> 
> "Ah have no idea,' Quickstrike replied to Dark Mouse. "All she said 
> was she found it from Hell Beast's disks. Ah reckon we's gonna find 
> out 'bout it when we get there." He squinted his crimson eyes.
